name: Alike Finder - Pic Brain Games
description:
Do you love Find the Difference, Spot the Difference and playing Puzzle Brain Games? You will love Alike Finder - a Brand New relaxing game of finding the Similar pictures by spotting the differences in the batch!

Most games you see on the store are Spot the Difference or Find the Difference. In this game, you are doing the complete opposite. You need to find the matching pair among a series of pictures & images!

Presented to you in each level will be a set of images such as donuts, flowers, or street signs. Scan the pictures, and find the matching pair! It's much more difficult than it looks! Once you find the matching pair of images, you move onto the next level, and the pictures get increasingly similar!

Each category will get increasingly difficult, and images with more similarities will emerge!
Find the difference with the images to eliminate possible pairs. Once you find the similar picture pair, tap each one, and move onto the next level!

Alike Finder features:

6 Fun Categories- Gardens, Foodie, Beach, Lost & Found, Travel and Hobbies!

Over 300 Challenging Levels!

Find All Pairs of Images!

Scan 100's of Pics and Match Pairs!

Bright, Crisp Graphics from Cupcakes to Cookies, Jewels to Marbles, and Candy to Chocolate!

FREE Hints! Shuffle Images for Help!

Relaxing Puzzle Game that's FUN for ALL Ages!
